structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Firefighters, hours off duty, in cities not required to comply with KRS 95.500.
law.text: In cities that are not required to comply with KRS 95.500, the city legislative body may by ordinance provide that members of the fire department shall receive a period of twenty-four (24) consecutive hours off duty in each period of fourteen (14) days, in addition to receiving twenty-four (24) hours off duty in each period of forty-eight (48) hours, except in cases of extraordinary emergency.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 119, effective January 1, 2015. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 227, sec. 1.
